REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2245 reute r f BC-UNISYS-<UIS>-IN-MARKE 06-19 0051

TEXT.TITLE: UNISYS <UIS> IN MARKETING AGREEMENT WITH VMARK
TEXT.BODY: Unisys Corp said its Value Added Marketing organization signed an agreement with privately held VMark Computer Inc for remarketing of the Unisys 5000 and 7000 series of minicomputers with VMark software. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
